arts.ttl: Arne Slot makes feelings on Jordan Henderson clear ahead of Liverpool reunion
arts.sum: Liverpool are due to face Brentford in the Premier League on Saturday and that means a reunion with former Premier League and Champions League winning captain Jordan Henderson

arts.ttl: Arne Slot speaks highly of two familiar faces from the Brentford squad
arts.sum: Former club captain Christian Norgaard is now at Arsenal, but Brentford have brought in Jordan Henderson as a seasoned veteran to try to stabilise the midfield, and they are reaping the rewards. ‚ÄúFor Caoimh, like I said, goalkeepers are a bit of an exception, but he did this for so many years that he felt it was time for him to start playing.

arts.ttl: Brentford‚Äôs Sepp van den Berg: ‚ÄòAt points at Liverpool I was going home crying‚Äô
arts.sum: Before facing his former club the defender explains why he left Anfield when Slot wanted him to stay and why he is loving life at Brentford Sepp van den Berg knew what he had to do. The Brentford centre-back knew what he was going to do. Another summer, another change; another push to find a footballing home. It was June 2024 and as he enjoyed a lunch in the sunshine with his brother and friends in their hometown of Zwolle in the Netherlands, he could reflect on an excellent season on loan from Liverpool at Mainz. ‚ÄúThen I got a tap on my shoulder,‚Äù Van den Berg says. It was Arne Slot. Another guy who had grown up in the area. Slot‚Äôs first job as a manager had been with the PEC Zwolle under-13s after he retired as a player at the club in 2013; Van den Berg, playing a year up, was in his squad. Now Slot had been confirmed as J√ºrgen Klopp‚Äôs successor at Liverpool and he was looking forward to the start of pre-season. Continue reading...

arts.ttl: Three Brentford stars who could restart Liverpool nightmare if Arne Slot isn't careful
arts.sum: Liverpool face Brentford on Saturday evening but will have to be mindful of the Bees' main threats in order to turn around their poor Premier League form

arts.ttl: 'We are not used to him missing chances': Arne Slot comments on Liverpool's Mohamed Salah ahead of Brentford

arts.ttl: Isak a doubt for Liverpool‚Äôs Premier League game at Brentford after groin injury
arts.sum: Alexander Isak is a doubt for Liverpool‚Äôs Premier League game at Brentford on Saturday after picking up a groin injury against Eintracht Frankfurt this week. Mohamed Salah is also struggling for form and has not scored in his last six games for Liverpool, but Slot said he was confident the goals would come for the Egypt international.

arts.ttl: Isak injury doubt for Liverpool at Brentford
arts.sum: Alexander Isak is an injury concern for Liverpool's trip to Brentford this weekend.

arts.ttl: Arne Slot Gives Alexander Isak, Jeremie Frimpong Injury Verdicts Before Brentford

arts.ttl: Brentford vs Liverpool predictions: Champions set for overdue capital gains
arts.sum: Tom McGarry expects Liverpool to snap their three-game losing streak in the Premier League by winning an entertaining contest away to Brentford on Saturday night.

arts.ttl: Arne Slot confirms four-man Liverpool injury update before Brentford trip
